title: Pipe and Compose
description: Implement pipe and compose higher-order functions. Pipe applies functions left-to-right; compose applies right-to-left. Build these from scratch using pure Kotlin.
instructions: Implement infix fun <A, B> A.pipe(f: (A) -> B): B and fun <A, B, C> compose(f: (B) -> C, g: (A) -> B): (A) -> C. Then use them to build a data transformation pipeline.

testCases.description: Compose should create a combined function

hints.text: compose returns a lambda: { a -> f(g(a)) }

commonMistakes.correction: Pipe = left-to-right (data flows forward). Compose = right-to-left (mathematical composition f(g(x)))
